code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import cartSlice from"./shopping-cart/cartSlice";import cartUiSlice from"./shopping-cart/cartUiSlice";import logger from'redux-logger';import thunk from'redux-thunk';const store=configureStore({reducer:{cart:cartSlice.reducer,cartUi:cartUiSlice.reducer,middleware:[thunk,logger]}});export default store;
